title: Sync Microsoft.Build version in analyzer template with Version.props during packing
body:
**Context**
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/9789 added a template for custom analyzer. Microsoft.Build version specified in the template should be synced with Version.props during packing. See https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/9789/files#r1521218723 for more details.
This needs to be done after #9915.

**Goal**
For the future iteration, Microsoft.Build version in analyzer template should be in synced with Version.props.

nodes.body: Currently, we can ref https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/documentation/release-checklist.md to update the version manually
